ResourceHeader.Description:
El Teide Observatory, Canary Islands Latitude N 028,18′,03.0″ 
	  Longitude W 016,30′,43.0″ Elevation 2425.0m This Instituto Astrofisica de 
	  Canarias (IAC) site is located near Izaña at an altitude of 2398m on the 
	  island of Tenerife, in the Canary Islands off the west coast of Africa. 
	  The IAC is administered by a public consortium which includes the 
	  Universidad de la Laguna.
